name: Feature 50
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign width = section.settings.width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius
  assign background_style = section.settings.background_style

  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile
  assign content_max_width = section.settings.content_max_width

  assign features_gap = section.settings.features_gap

  assign feature_align = section.settings.feature_align
  assign feature_align_mobile = section.settings.feature_align_mobile

  assign feature_horizontal_align = ""
  if feature_align == "center"
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif feature_align == "right"
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign feature_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if feature_align_mobile == "center"
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif feature_align_mobile == "right"
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign feature_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign feature_image_size = section.settings.feature_image_size
  assign feature_image_size_mobile = section.settings.feature_image_size_mobile
  assign feature_image_border_color = section.settings.feature_image_border_color
  assign feature_image_border_thickness = section.settings.feature_image_border_thickness
  assign feature_image_radius = section.settings.feature_image_radius
  assign feature_image_mt = section.settings.feature_image_mt
  assign feature_image_mt_mobile = section.settings.feature_image_mt_mobile

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign image = section.settings.image
  assign image_border_thickness = section.settings.image_border_thickness
  assign image_border_color = section.settings.image_border_color
  assign image_radius = section.settings.image_radius
  assign image_ratio = section.settings.image_ratio
  assign image_ratio_mobile = section.settings.image_ratio_mobile

  assign dot_color = section.settings.dot_color
  assign dot_pulse = section.settings.dot_pulse
  assign line_thickness = section.settings.line_thickness
  assign use_image = section.settings.use_image

  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color

  assign lazy_load_setting = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign lazy_load_setting = 'eager'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;    
  }
  
  .feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .feature-features-mobile-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid !important;
  }

  .feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} .feature-feature-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

   .feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} .feature-feature-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active {
    opacity: 1 !important;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    width: 1px;
    margin-top: 55px;
  }

  .feature-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: 40px;
    position: relative;
    align-items: center;
    z-index: 2;
    margin-top: {{ feature_image_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .feature-features-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-direction: column;
  }

  .feature-feature-{{ section.id }} {
    cursor: pointer;
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    align-items: start;
  }
  
  .feature-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;       
    text-transform: unset;
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    text-align: {{ feature_align_mobile }};
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    font-weight: 700;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    width: 90%;
  }
  
  .feature-text-{{ section.id }} {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    text-align: {{ feature_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;    
    width: 90%;
  }

  .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;    
    text-transform: unset;
    word-wrap: break-word;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};  
  }

  .feature-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    flex-direction: column;
    position: relative;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    border: {{ image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0;
  }

  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .feature-dot-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block !important;
    position: absolute;
    width: 12px;
    height: 12px;
    border-radius: 100%;
    background-color: {{ dot_color }};
    opacity: 0;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .feature-lines-svg-{{ section.id }} .feature-line-all {
      stroke-dasharray: 0; 
      stroke-dashoffset: 0;
      stroke: {{ dot_color }};
      transition: none;
  }

  .feature-lines-svg-{{ section.id }} path {
    stroke: {{ dot_color }};
  }

  .feature-line-all,
  .active-feature-line {
    stroke-dasharray: 6 4;
  }

  .feature-dot-{{ section.id }}.in-view {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .feature-dot-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
   
  .feature-icon-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
    border: {{ feature_image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ feature_image_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ feature_image_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    width: {{ feature_image_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ feature_image_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .feature-icon-{{ section.id }} img,
  .feature-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .feature-icon-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background: #AFAFAF;
  }
  
  .feature-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: 2;
    gap: 10px;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: end;
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }

    .feature-features-mobile-wrap-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }  

    .feature-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr 1fr;
      margin-top: {{ feature_image_mt }}px;
    }

    .feature-features-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ features_gap }}px;
    }

    .feature-feature-{{ section.id }} {
      align-items: {{ feature_horizontal_align }};
    }
    
    .feature-title-{{ section.id }} {     
      width: 100%;
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      text-align: {{ feature_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 100%;
      text-align: {{ feature_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;    
    }

    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      width: 100%;
    }

    
    .feature-icon-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ feature_image_size }}px;
      height: {{ feature_image_size }}px;
    }

    .feature-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% if width == 'custom' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif width == 'page' %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: var(--page-width);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if dot_pulse %}
  <style>
    .feature-dot-{{ section.id }}::after {
      content: "";
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      left: 50%; 
      top: 50%;   
      -webkit-animation: pulseMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 1.25s ease-in-out infinite;
      animation: pulseMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} 1.25s ease-in-out infinite;
      background-color: {{ dot_color }};
      border-radius: 50%;
      box-sizing: border-box;
      transform: translate3d(-50%, -50%, 0);
      transition: opacity 0.25s linear;
      height: 10px;
      width: 10px;
      z-index: -1;
    }
    
    @keyframes pulseMobile{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
      0% {
        transform: translate3d(-50%, -50%, 0) scale(1);
        opacity: 1;
      }
      100% {
        transform: translate3d(-50%, -50%, 0) scale(2.5);
        opacity: 0;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

    .feature-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
    
    .feature-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if feature_align_mobile == 'right' %}
  <style>
    .feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-right: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if image_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif image_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media (min-width: 1024px) {
      .feature-image-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
        }

        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {          
          margin: 0;            
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }   
        
        .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} strong {
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_accent_color }};
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
          }

          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {                
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }  
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      
      {% if content_align_mobile == "center" %}
        <style>
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align_mobile == "right" %}
        <style>
          .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if content_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-heading-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'button' %}  
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          max-width: fit-content;
          gap: 10px;
          width: 100%;
          margin: 0;         
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt_mobile }}px;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.button_height }}%;
          text-align: center;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.button_radius }}px;
          transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
          background-color: transparent;
          border: 0px;
          cursor: pointer;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        .feature-button-inner-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0px;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          text-decoration: none;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} svg {
          width: 14px;
          height: 14px;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        @media (min-width: 1024px) {
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.button_mt }}px;
            padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal }}px;
            font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.use_shadow %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            -moz-box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 2px {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}  

      {% if block.settings.button_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.button_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.button_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.button_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.button_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline" or block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
      
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "outline" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>          
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{  block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }
      
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
            background-color: {{  block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            border: {{  block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
            -webkit-box-shadow: none !important;
            -moz-box-shadow: none !important;
            box-shadow: none !important;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}   

      
      {% if content_align_mobile == "center" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align_mobile == "right" %}
        <style>
          .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if content_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-button-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'feature' %}
      <style>
        .feature-dot-{{ block.id }} {
            left: {{ block.settings.horizontal_position_mobile }}%;
            top: {{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}%;
            transform: translate(-{{ block.settings.horizontal_position_mobile }}%, -{{ block.settings.vertical_position_mobile }}%);
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-dot-{{ block.id }} {
                left: {{ block.settings.horizontal_position }}%;
                top: {{ block.settings.vertical_position }}%;
                transform: translate(-{{ block.settings.horizontal_position }}%, -{{ block.settings.vertical_position }}%);
            }
        }
      </style>

    {% when 'text' %}   
      <style>
        {{  block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
          position: relative;
          z-index: 2;
          max-width: 100%;
        }
      
        .feature-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          
          .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
             max-width: {{ content_max_width }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{  content_align }};
          }
      
          .feature-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
          
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .feature-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>          
      {% endif %}   

      {% if content_align_mobile == "center" %}
        <style>
          .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
            margin-right: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align_mobile == "right" %}
        <style>
          .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-left: auto;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if content_align == "center" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: auto;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif content_align == "right" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: auto;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .feature-text-{{ block.id }} {
              margin-left: 0px;
              margin-right: 0px;
            } 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

  {% endcase %}  
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} feature-{{ section.id }}" {% if background_style == 'solid' %}style="background-color:{{ background_color }};"{% else %} style="background-image: {{ background_gradient }};"{% endif %}>
  <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
    {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% case block.type %}
          {% when 'heading' %}  
            {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
              <div class="feature-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
            {% endif %}   
          {% when 'text' %}
            {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
              <div class="feature-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
            {% endif %}  
                    
          {% else %}            
        {% endcase %}
    {% endfor %}
    <div class="feature-body-{{ section.id }}">
      <div class="feature-features-{{ section.id }} feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %} 
          {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
            {% if block.settings.column == 'first' %}
              <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }}" id="{{ block.id }}">             
                {% if use_image %}    
                  <div class="feature-icon-{{ section.id }} feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                      {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                      {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 535 | image_tag:
                          loading: lazy_load_setting,
                          width: block.settings.image.width,
                          height: block.settings.image.height,
                          sizes: sizes,
                          widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                      }}
                      {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                      {% endif %}
                  </div> 
                {% else %}  
                  <div class="feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}" style="margin-left: auto;">
                  </div>
                {% endif %}         
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}                    
                  <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>              
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                {% endif %}
              </div> 
            {% endif %}
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      <div class="feature-features-mobile-wrap-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }} swiper">
          <div class="feature-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
            <button class="feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>   
          </div>
          <div class="swiper-wrapper">
            {% for block in section.blocks %}
              {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
                <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if use_image %}    
                    <div class="feature-icon-{{ section.id }} feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}">
                        {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                        {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                        {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 535 | image_tag:
                            loading: lazy_load_setting,
                            width: block.settings.image.width,
                            height: block.settings.image.height,
                            sizes: sizes,
                            widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                        }}
                        {% else %}
                        {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                        {% endif %}
                    </div> 
                  {% else %}  
                    <div class="feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}">
                    </div>
                  {% endif %}         
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}                    
                    <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>              
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                      <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div> 
              {% endif %}
            {% endfor %}
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="feature-image-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="feature-image-{{ section.id }}"> 
          {% if image != blank %} 
            {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
              {{ image | image_url: width: 1500 | image_tag:
                loading: lazy_load_setting,
                width: image.width,
                height: image.height,
                sizes: sizes,
                widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
              }}
          {% else %}
            {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
          {% endif %} 
        </div>
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
            <div class="feature-dot-{{ section.id }} feature-dot-{{ block.id }}" data-id="{{ block.id }}"></div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
        <svg class="feature-lines-svg-{{ section.id }}" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; pointer-events: none; overflow: visible;"></svg>
      </div>
      <div class="feature-features-{{ section.id }} feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %} 
          {% if block.type == 'feature' %}
            {% if block.settings.column == 'second' %}
              <div class="feature-feature-{{ section.id }} second" id="{{ block.id }}">         
                {% if use_image %}    
                <div class="feature-icon-{{ section.id }} feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                    {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 535 | image_tag:
                        loading: lazy_load_setting,
                        width: block.settings.image.width,
                        height: block.settings.image.height,
                        sizes: sizes,
                        widths: '360, 535, 750, 1070, 1500'
                    }}
                    {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                </div> 
                {% else %}  
                  <div class="feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}" style="margin-right: auto;">
                  </div>
                {% endif %}        
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}                             
                  <p class="feature-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>                 
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="feature-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                {% endif %}
              </div> 
            {% endif %}
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
    </div>

    {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% case block.type %}
        {% when 'button' %}
          {% if block.settings.button != blank %}                 
              <a href="{{ block.settings.url }}" {% if block.settings.open_in_new_tab %}target="_blank"{% endif %} class="feature-button-{{ block.id }}">
                  <p class="feature-button-inner-{{ block.id }}">
                  {{ block.settings.button }}
                  {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                      <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                      <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                      <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                      <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                      </svg>
                  {% endif %}
                  </p>
              </a>     
          {% endif %}  
      {% endcase %}
    {% endfor %}
  </div>
</div>

{% if lazy %}
  <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initFeatureLines50{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}() {
    {% if lazy %}
    let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();
    window.addEventListener(
      "LazyLoad::Initialized",
      function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },
      false
    );
    {% endif %}

    function startDraw() {
      let isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 1024px)').matches;

      if(!isMobile) {      
        const sectionEl = document.querySelector('.section-{{ section.id }}');
        const featureItems = sectionEl.querySelectorAll('.feature-features-mobile-wrap-{{ section.id }} .feature-feature-{{ section.id }}');
        const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-features-mobile-wrap-{{ section.id }} .feature-dot-{{ section.id }}');
        const allFeatureItems = sectionEl.querySelectorAll('.feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} .feature-feature-{{ section.id }}');
        const svgContainer = sectionEl.querySelector(`.feature-lines-svg-{{ section.id }}`);

        function setActiveFeature(activeElement) {
          featureItems.forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
          dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));

          if (activeElement) {
            activeElement.classList.add('active');
            const featureId = activeElement.id;
            const activeDot = document.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${featureId}"]`);
            if (activeDot) {
              activeDot.classList.add('active');
            }
          }
          
          drawActiveFeatureLine();
        }
        
        let linesDrawnForDesktop = false;

        function resetLinesAndClasses() {
          if (svgContainer) svgContainer.innerHTML = '';
          if(!isMobile) {
            allFeatureItems.forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active', 'in-view'));
          }      
          document.querySelectorAll('.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}').forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active', 'in-view'));
          linesDrawnForDesktop = false;
        }
        
        function drawAllLines() {
          resetLinesAndClasses();

          if (linesDrawnForDesktop || !svgContainer) return;

          const svgRect = svgContainer.getBoundingClientRect();

          if(!isMobile) {
            allFeatureItems.forEach((featureItem) => {
              const featureId = featureItem.id;
              const startDotElement = featureItem.querySelector(`.feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}`);
              const endDot = sectionEl.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${featureId}"]`);

              if (!startDotElement || !endDot) return;

              featureItem.classList.add('in-view'); // Класс для всех элементов
              endDot.classList.add('in-view'); // Класс для всех точек

              const startRect = startDotElement.getBoundingClientRect();
              const endRect = endDot.getBoundingClientRect();

              const startX = startRect.left + startRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
              const startY = startRect.top + startRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;
              const endX = endRect.left + endRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
              const endY = endRect.top + endRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;


              const midPointX = endX; 
              const pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${midPointX} V ${endY}`;


              const path = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "path");
              path.setAttribute("d", pathD);
              path.setAttribute("stroke", "currentColor");
              path.setAttribute("stroke-width", "{{ line_thickness }}");
              path.setAttribute("fill", "none");
              path.setAttribute("class", "feature-line-all"); 
              svgContainer.appendChild(path);

              const pathLength = path.getTotalLength();
              path.style.strokeDasharray = pathLength;
              path.style.strokeDashoffset = pathLength;
              
              setTimeout(() => {
                path.style.transition = `stroke-dashoffset 1000ms ease-out`;
                path.style.strokeDashoffset = '0';
              }, 50);
            });
          }

          linesDrawnForDesktop = true; 
        }

        function drawActiveFeatureLine() {
          if (svgContainer) {
            svgContainer.innerHTML = '';
          } else {
            console.warn('SVG container not found. Cannot draw line.');
            return;
          }

          const activeFeature = document.querySelector(`.feature-feature-{{ section.id }}.active`);
          const activeDot = document.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}.active`);

          if (activeFeature && activeDot) {
            const startDotElement = activeFeature.querySelector(`.feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}`);
            if (!startDotElement) return;

            const startRect = startDotElement.getBoundingClientRect();
            const endRect = activeDot.getBoundingClientRect();
            const svgRect = svgContainer.getBoundingClientRect();

            const startX = startRect.left + startRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
            const startY = startRect.top + startRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;
            const endX = endRect.left + endRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
            const endY = endRect.top + endRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;

            const isSecondColumn = activeFeature.classList.contains('second');
            const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches;

            let pathD;
            
            if (isMobile) {
                const middleX = svgRect.width - 20;
                pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${middleX} V ${endY} H ${endX}`;
            } else {
                const midPointX = endX;
                if (!isSecondColumn) {
                  pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${midPointX} V ${endY}`;
                } else {
                  pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${midPointX} V ${endY}`;
                }
            }

            const path = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "path");
            path.setAttribute("d", pathD);
            path.setAttribute("stroke", "currentColor");
            path.setAttribute("stroke-width", "{{ line_thickness }}");
            path.setAttribute("fill", "none");
            path.setAttribute("class", "active-feature-line");
            svgContainer.appendChild(path);

            const pathLength = path.getTotalLength();
            const duration = 1000;
            let startTime = null;

            function animatePath(timestamp) {
              if (!startTime) {
                startTime = timestamp;
              }

              const elapsed = timestamp - startTime;
              const progress = Math.min(elapsed / duration, 1);
              const animatedLength = pathLength * progress;

              path.style.strokeDasharray = `${animatedLength} ${pathLength}`;

              if (progress < 1) {
                requestAnimationFrame(animatePath);
              }
            }

            requestAnimationFrame(animatePath);
          }
        }

        function updateFeatureState(isSectionVisible) {
          const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches;

          if (!isSectionVisible) {
            resetLinesAndClasses();
            return;
          }
          
          if (!linesDrawnForDesktop) {
            drawAllLines();
            if (desktopFeatures.length > 0) {
              desktopFeatures[0].classList.add('active'); 
              const firstDot = sectionEl.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${desktopFeatures[0].id}"]`);
              if (firstDot) firstDot.classList.add('active');
            }
          }    
        }

        const observer = new IntersectionObserver((entries) => {
          entries.forEach(entry => {
            updateFeatureState(entry.isIntersecting);
          });
        }, {
          root: null,
          rootMargin: '0px',
          threshold: 0.1 
        });

        observer.observe(sectionEl);


        desktopFeatures.forEach((featureItem) => {
          featureItem.addEventListener('click', () => {
            desktopFeatures.forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
            document.querySelectorAll('.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}').forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));

            featureItem.classList.add('active');
            const activeDot = sectionEl.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${featureItem.id}"]`);
            if (activeDot) {
              activeDot.classList.add('active');
            }
          });
        });

        let resizeTimer;
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
          resizeTimer = setTimeout(() => { 
            resetLinesAndClasses(); 
            updateFeatureState(observer.root !== null && sectionEl.getBoundingClientRect().top < window.innerHeight);
          }, 250);
        });
      } else {
        const featureItems = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-feature-{{ section.id }}');
        const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}');
        const svgContainer = document.querySelector(`.feature-lines-svg-{{ section.id }}`);        

        function setActiveFeature(activeElement) {
          featureItems.forEach(item => item.classList.remove('active'));
          dots.forEach(dot => dot.classList.remove('active'));

          if (activeElement) {
            activeElement.classList.add('active');
            const featureId = activeElement.id;
            const activeDot = document.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${featureId}"]`);
            if (activeDot) {
              activeDot.classList.add('active');
            }
          }

          drawActiveFeatureLine();
        }

        function drawActiveFeatureLine() {
          if (svgContainer) {
            svgContainer.innerHTML = '';
          } else {
            console.warn('SVG container not found. Cannot draw line.');
            return;
          }

          const activeFeature = document.querySelector(`.feature-feature-{{ section.id }}.active`);
          const activeDot = document.querySelector(`.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}.active`);

          if (activeFeature && activeDot) {
            const startDotElement = activeFeature.querySelector(`.feature-start-dot-{{ section.id }}`);
            if (!startDotElement) return;

            const startRect = startDotElement.getBoundingClientRect();
            const endRect = activeDot.getBoundingClientRect();
            const svgRect = svgContainer.getBoundingClientRect();

            const startX = startRect.left + startRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
            const startY = startRect.top + startRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;
            const endX = endRect.left + endRect.width / 2 - svgRect.left;
            const endY = endRect.top + endRect.height / 2 - svgRect.top;

            const isSecondColumn = activeFeature.classList.contains('second');
            const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches;

            let pathD;
            
            if (isMobile) {
                const middleX = svgRect.width - 20;
                pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${middleX} V ${endY} H ${endX}`;
            } else {
                const midPointX = endX;
                if (!isSecondColumn) {
                  pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${midPointX} V ${endY}`;
                } else {
                  pathD = `M ${startX} ${startY} H ${midPointX} V ${endY}`;
                }
            }

            const path = document.createElementNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/svg", "path");
            path.setAttribute("d", pathD);
            path.setAttribute("stroke", "currentColor");
            path.setAttribute("stroke-width", "{{ line_thickness }}");
            path.setAttribute("fill", "none");
            path.setAttribute("class", "active-feature-line");
            svgContainer.appendChild(path);

            // --- НОВАЯ ЛОГИКА АНИМАЦИИ ---
            const pathLength = path.getTotalLength();
            const duration = 1000; // 1000ms = 1 секунда
            let startTime = null;

            function animatePath(timestamp) {
              if (!startTime) {
                startTime = timestamp;
              }

              const elapsed = timestamp - startTime;
              const progress = Math.min(elapsed / duration, 1); // Прогресс от 0 до 1
              const animatedLength = pathLength * progress;

              // Устанавливаем dasharray равным текущей длине,
              // чтобы создать эффект "рисования"
              path.style.strokeDasharray = `${animatedLength} ${pathLength}`;

              if (progress < 1) {
                requestAnimationFrame(animatePath);
              }
            }

            requestAnimationFrame(animatePath);
            // --- КОНЕЦ НОВОЙ ЛОГИКИ ---
          }
        }
        
        const slider = new Swiper(".feature-features-mobile-{{ section.id }}", {
          speed: 500,
          slidesPerView: 1,
          effect: "fade",
          centeredSlides: true,
          loop: true,
          navigation: {
            nextEl: '.feature-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
            prevEl: '.feature-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}',
          },
          on: {
            slideChange: function () {
              setActiveFeature(this.slides[this.activeIndex]);
            },
          },
        });

        let resizeTimer;
        window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
          clearTimeout(resizeTimer);
          resizeTimer = setTimeout(() => { 
            const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches;
            if (isMobile) {
              setActiveFeature(slider.slides[slider.activeIndex]);
            } else {
              setActiveFeature(document.querySelector('.feature-features-desktop-{{ section.id }} .feature-feature-{{ section.id }}.active') || desktopFeatures[0]);
            }
          }, 250);
        });

        const isMobile = window.matchMedia('(max-width: 768px)').matches;
        if (isMobile) {
          if (slider.slides.length > 0) {
            setActiveFeature(slider.slides[0]);
          }
        } else {
          if (desktopFeatures.length > 0) {
            setActiveFeature(desktopFeatures[0]);
          }
        }
      } 
    }
    

    let resizeTimer;
    window.addEventListener('resize', () => {
      setTimeout(() => {
        const newDots = document.querySelectorAll('.feature-dot-{{ section.id }}');
        newDots.forEach(dot => {
          dot.classList.remove('active');
          dot.classList.remove('in-view')
        });
        startDraw();
      }, 200)      
    }); 

    startDraw(); 
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => initFeatureLines50{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}());

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', () => initFeatureLines50{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}());
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', () => initFeatureLines50{{ section.id | replace: '-', '' }}());
  }
</script>
